headline: Hilton Worldwide Holdings (NYSE:HLT) Removed From Four Major Russell Value Indices
summary: Hilton Worldwide Holdings (NYSE:HLT) experienced a 17% share price increase over the last quarter amid significant company and market developments. The company's removal from multiple indices on June 30 represents a shift that may affect investment interest. Nevertheless, Hilton's robust first-quarter earnings performance, highlighted by increased revenue and net income, coupled with a strategic dividend and share buyback initiative, likely bolstered investor confidence. Additionally, the...

headline: Hilton Worldwide (HLT) Moves 3.1% Higher: Will This Strength Last?
summary: Hilton Worldwide (HLT) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.
